@halsey From an EMT: educate yourself on gun shot wound care! In shoulder gurdle or pelvis area: pack the wound with gauze and wrap as much as possible to put as much pressure as you can to stop the bleed. In chest and abdomen: use a chest seal, get a piece of plastic similar to a ziploc https://t.co/jxzqJY2zPI
